metadata.title: CVE-2021-20261 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernels implementation of thefloppy disk drive controller driver software. The impact of this issue islessened by the fact that the default permissions on the floppy device(/dev/fd0) are restricted to root. If the permissions on the device havechanged the impact changes greatly. In the default configuration root (orequivalent) permissions are required to attack this flaw.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
